    android.content.DialogInterface.OnClickListener, android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.support.v4.view.TintableBackgroundView, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent, android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener, AlgoliaErrorListener, AlgoliaResultsListener, AlgoliaSearcherListener, AlgoliaFilter

    public class NumericSelector
extends android.support.v7.widget.AppCompatSpinner
implements AlgoliaFilter, AlgoliaResultsListener, AlgoliaErrorListener, AlgoliaSearcherListener, android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener
    Displays a dropdown menu to refine a specific attribute with one of several values.
